Package cscd212classes.lab3.players

Class Player

java.lang.Object
cscd212classes.lab3.cscd212classes.lab3.players.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseballPlayer, FootballPlayer, HockeyPlayer
public abstract class Player extends Object implements Cloneable
The abstract Player class represents a basic Player
